Reviews.Title: “Noisy, dated hotel; mediocre service”
Reviews.Author: Mariana R
Reviews.Content: dont giving poor reviews unfortunately hotel deserves rating noise facing courtyard 5th floor night people courtyard school night 11pm midnight complete hour tow awful woke couldnt fall asleep im light sleeper people live building guests probably wont luck called reception multiple times complain pick phone claim 24hour reception woman didnt downstairs scream window suck sleep walls absolutely paper thin hear people walking theyre saying outside added aggravation confirmation didnt arrived annoying junior suite couch curtain stained phones didnt completely unsafe apartment building people reception friend booked promotion eur 10 discount receptionist told mistake shouldnt able discount online honor offer checkout receptionist charged eur 10 pay putting fight relented receptionist checkout credit card hadnt charged booked happy junior suite condescending irritating cleanest ive crud stuck feet walked cold floor phone handle greasy walls beat scuffed covered plaster spots door locks mine friends stuck hard hotel location minutes vatican probably staying bb close

Reviews.Title: “Great location.”
Reviews.Author: judfry1
Reviews.Content: amalia location rome clean wife booked ensuite means bathroom downstairs outside amalia italian cafe definitely stay

Reviews.Title: “Location is superior”
Reviews.Author: Vivian B
Reviews.Content: stayed october 2011 5 days 4 nights med cruise location perfect center rome 10 minute walk vatican shopping restaurants near cousins suite price paid mentioned front desk willing adjust ours serve unfair stay getting clean staff friendly helpful daily continental breakfast decent tv italian dont speak language didnt dont tv cause annoying watching language speak understand

Reviews.Content: vatican metro stop 5min walk hotel tastefully decorated clean elevator style elegant ones manually close door lovely negatives complementary toiletries eg shampoo bathroom dining breakfast little quickly fills service typically roman minimal hint smile rome hotel bit pricey value money rome

Reviews.Content: frills family 2x adults 2x teenagers stayed amalia quad 1824 dec luckily driver hotel hotel otherwise dont found staff quiet dont definitely arent forward recommendations little 4 people clean cleaning staff excellent helpful morning breakfast pretty lobby staff frequently feel guest paying customer weigh decision staying location access vatican metro shopping looks hotel process starting renovations

Reviews.Title: “EXCELLENT LOCATION”
Reviews.Author: Valerie5510
Reviews.Content: husband stayed april five days taxi hotel collect return journey cost 42 euro pay worth itthe hotel location vatican city walked various attractionsthe hotel clean basic sleep recommend hotel stay

Reviews.Title: “Clean and spacious room, great location!”
Reviews.Author: toyshop
Reviews.Content: reservation double classic 2 nights arrived pleased checked spacious clean window view wasnt distance vatican superb 10 minutes 5 minutes metro dont staff service dont expect super service fair respond queries help honestly approach dont offer help recommendation greet leave return expect 3 stars hotel offer bottled drink bar fridge charge experienced italy hotels told refer charges hotel enquired bottled water chargable overall experience wasnt bad lot staff responsive friendly

Reviews.Title: “Average rooms great location”
Reviews.Author: Warwicker08
Reviews.Content: stayed recently anniversary trip italy hotel fantastic location minutes walk vatican close restaurants lots shopping walked trevi fountain spanish steps hotel modest clean staff friendly overly helpful theyll answer questions didnt bare bones bed comfortable exhausted didnt matter breakfast fine special definitely edible overall satisfied stay staying budget hotel realistic im id stay dont regrets staying time

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic hotel - great value and top location!!”
Reviews.Author: 19ruprect73
Reviews.Content: wife stayed hotel amalia 4 nights march 2011 time rome little unsure finding hotel worry 5 minutes walk metro station road junction bus routes terminated cross main road literally vatican city location hotel clean whitest sheets ive seen king size bed werent expecting nice surprise equipped double wardrobe ensuite showertoilet tv minibar safe free charge breakfast light airy breakfast fresh selection cereals breads pastries fruit tea coffee etc hotel staff friendliest people met travels helped transport questions tourist advice laugh joke nice people definitely rome staying hotel amalia return thankyou hotel experience

Reviews.Title: “Lovely hotel, perfect for sightseeing”
Reviews.Author: Monkey6870
Reviews.Content: hotel loved lovely clean breakfast location vatican near metro sightseeing near lovely cafes restaurants female receptionist duty time helpful spoke english weve rome twice return stay hotel recommend

Reviews.Title: “Clean, comfortable, friendly, well located and good value for money”
Reviews.Author: OttawaTraveller002
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel fall 2009 single classed green clean quiet comfortable spacious staff friendly excellent value money charged hotel central vatican museums rome metro system couple blocks else quickly local neighbourhood shops restaurants solves restaurant hotel evening meals continental breakfast included definitely stay

Reviews.Content: little hotel comfortable facing inner courtyard quieter street daughter husband found noisy street sounds mattress comfortable mattress home little dressing oversized bathroom daughters bathroom pleasant loved location street near vatican neighbourhood stayed door cafe foodwine store fun shop inexpensive internet cafe block found restaurants staff front desk friendly helpful especially leonardo maria thanks excellent service disappointment breakfast served am pleasant selection limited cereal flakes plain rolls various extremely sweet pastries jams honey soft cheese coffee major letdown tasted awful tries switched tea land excellent coffee habit coffee shop block ottaviano morning leaving hotel daughter celiac disease digest gluten breakfast day 2 bowls hot milk honey found grocery store brought fresh fruit yogurt muesli raisins glutenfree bread breakfast suggestion hotel please add fresh fruit yogurt maybe boiled eggs glutenfree bread restaurants offerings extend breakfast hours 10 am rush 9 please please brew coffee mille grazie love stay especially changes

Reviews.Title: “Great Friendly Hotel”

Reviews.Content: time stay amalia hotel rome friendly hotel staff helpful provided lots information recommendation location fantastic local resturants home food shopping blocks vatican love hotel stay rome

Reviews.Title: “Great Value, Friendly Staff”
Reviews.Author: akey1101
Reviews.Content: stayed six nights july probably romes busiest month amalia located tiber main tourist little quieter nice evenings close vatican line 2 blocks hotel pretty else city amalia exactly expected roman hotel queensized bed taking desk wardrobe flatscreen tv mounted wall window looked street floor meant didnt rickety elevator bed pillows surprisingly comfortable sleep vacation despite jetlag bathroom probably disappointing aspect hotel toilet duvet sink shower tiny plastic wraparound door leaked bit wasnt water pressure breakfast nook typical coffee juices pastries bread cheese staff elsewhere hotel wonderful attentive excellent recommendations stores restaurants internet pretty expensive nearby internet cafe likewise calls usthey werent outrageous cheaper block overall excellent stay basic thats looking forthe main draw obviously remarkable city days definitely returned city

Reviews.Title: “Great Value, Clean and Comfortable.”
Reviews.Author: sage09
Reviews.Content: stayed april 2010 single hotel unless youre prepared fork mega bucks italian hotel basic anyway fine clean comfortable breakfast staff friendly helpful wifi available cost €5 3 hours bathroom clean minor negative shower cramped impacts 4 minutes day concern definitely return hotel couple minutes vatican metro ottaviano

Reviews.Title: “Recommended Hotel - Cheap and very Cheerful ! I would use again”

Reviews.Content: stayed march 2010 night break arrived hotel 1100 am allowed check key nice check usual til 200 lucky view vatican yes basic short break wardrobe queen size bed mini bar etc clean bathroom breakfast croissants cakes cereal etc choice orange juice tea coffee fresh set day hotel situate short walk vatican restaurants shops nearby recommend getting bus colloseum top road 1 euro bus walked taking sites trevi fountain spanish steps etc stop coffee stand bar 1 euro sit table rises 3 euros restaurants pricey home added 750 euros service charge bar bottom road bus stops charge 600 euros beer obviously city expect pay overall highly recommend hotel reception staff helpful giving info stay
